abstract: h&m apologizes for racist hoodie after backlash .
article: swedish clothing giant h&m came under fire for featuring a photo of a black child model sporting a hoodie with `` coolest monkey in the jungle '' screen-printed across the chest . it did n't take long for the twitterverse to spring into action : . after receiving quite a bit of backlash , the clothing company issues an apology for the misstep . a spokesperson for h&m told the independent the image had been removed , adding : `` we apologize to anyone this may have offended . ''
